Text: One of Thomas Cook's lenders, Royal Bank of Scotland, also had news of its own, as the bank appointed Alison Rose as its new chief executive officer. Ms Rose was the heavy favourite to succeed Ross McEwan as boss of the publicly owned bank when he departs from the company on October 31. Shareholders seemed happy, with shares closing up 5.5p at 213.5p.
Cause: One of Thomas Cook's lenders, Royal Bank of Scotland, also had news of its own, as the bank appointed Alison Rose as its new chief executive officer.
Effect: Shareholders seemed happy, with shares closing up 5.5p at 213.5p.
Sentence: <e1>One of Thomas Cook's lenders, Royal Bank of Scotland, also had news of its own, as the bank appointed Alison Rose as its new chief executive officer.</e1> Ms Rose was the heavy favourite to succeed Ross McEwan as boss of the publicly owned bank when he departs from the company on October 31. <e2>Shareholders seemed happy, with shares closing up 5.5p at 213.5p.</e2>
